title: Analyze Delta-2 Codebase
description: Deep scan and analyze the codebase to understand its logic and functionality.

title: Create PRD Document
description: Create a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for the delta-2 project that outlines the current functionality, architecture, and future plans.

title: Design Folder Structure
description: Create a streamlined folder structure for the delta-2 project that follows best practices and allows for easy debugging and extension.

title: Implement Orchestrator Module
description: Create an orchestrator module that will coordinate the execution of all components in the delta-2 project, including proper error handling, logging, and configuration management.

title: Create Configuration System
description: Implement a configuration system for the delta-2 project that allows for easy configuration of all components, including scrapers, processors, and analyzers.

title: Setup and Test Environment
description: Create a virtual environment, install requirements, and test run the delta-2 project.

title: Debug Google News Scraper Issues
description: Analyze and fix issues with the Google News scraper that resulted in zero articles being scraped. Improve error handling and logging to better diagnose problems.

title: Debug Yahoo Finance Scraper Issues
description: This task has been completed as part of task #15 (Fix Yahoo Finance Scraper). We've successfully fixed the Yahoo Finance scraper to extract multiple articles by implementing the specific selectors from the working implementation in yai_scraper.py. The scraper now correctly extracts article titles, links, sources, and timestamps.

title: Fix Sentiment Analyzer Data Format Issues
description: Working on fixing sentiment analyzer data format issues to ensure proper handling of timestamps and other data fields.

title: Improve Directory and File Handling
description: Ensure all necessary directories are created before access, add initialization checks for data directories, implement better error handling for missing files, and add clear error messages to help diagnose issues.

title: Implement Comprehensive Error Handling
description: Add try-except blocks around critical operations, improve error messages with actionable information, add recovery mechanisms for common failures, and implement logging of full stack traces for debugging.

title: Refactor Code for Better Maintainability
description: Standardize error handling across modules, improve code organization and documentation, remove duplicate code and create shared utilities, and add comments to improve code readability.

title: Add Sample Data Generation for Testing
description: Task removed as per user's request. Sample data generation for testing is not needed for this project.

title: Fix Google News Data Quality Issues
description: The Google News scraper is extracting articles but with incorrect data: titles only show source names, links are empty, and source/time information is swapped. Need to update CSS selectors and fix data extraction logic.

title: Fix Yahoo Finance Scraper
description: The Yahoo Finance scraper in the new architecture is only extracting one article, while the original yai_scraper.py is working perfectly. Need to analyze the differences and fix the new implementation.

title: Fix Google News Scraper Limit
description: Investigate and fix the Google News scraper to ensure it extracts more than 100 articles when available. Currently, it appears to be limiting the number of articles extracted.

title: Filter Out Low-Quality Yahoo Finance Articles
description: Implement filtering in the Yahoo Finance scraper to exclude low-quality articles like "BC-Corn Futures", "BC-Wheat Futures", and similar automated financial updates that don't provide meaningful sentiment data.

title: Fix Broken Google News Scraper
description: The Google News scraper is not working at all. Need to check the logs, identify the issue, and fix it urgently.

title: Fix Google News Article Limit Issue
description: The Google News scraper is only saving exactly 100 articles even when it extracts more. Need to identify and fix the cause of this limitation.

title: Fix Sentiment Processor datetime Error
description: The sentiment processor is failing with the error 'name 'datetime' is not defined'. Need to add the missing import for the datetime module.

title: Sort Google News Articles by Time (Old to New)
description: Update the Google News scraper to sort articles by timestamp from oldest to newest when saving data.
